Giving this game a positive review is a bit difficult, is it fun? It can be sure, but theres a few massive issues with the game as well. 

First of all, i'll talk from killer perspective. If you are like me, when you play killer, 95% of your games will be played against toxic 3 man or 4 man SWF, who literally just try to make you mad, flash light spamming, spamming lockers to make annoying noises, usually its done so that you chase them so they can tea bag you at every pallet while their team mates gen rush the hell out of you. If you are galaxy brained like myself, you would switch to wraith, slap on your silent bell with a movement speed add-on and you would absolutely DEMOLISH any garbage SWF group you come across, which is easy to do since as a unit they are strong, but individually they are weak as piss and that's why they play SWF. Sadly, this option is now gone, the dev's don't care about killer or how stressful the game can be for killer, and if this games past history wasn't evidence enough of that, now you can no longer change killers whilst in a lobby, so if you join the lobby first, you are playing a killer you have fun with, for example drift billy, then all of a sudden a 4 man pops into your lobby, you can't go and change killers to one you know you will make them cry over, they removed the option a little while ago, BAD. However, if you AREN'T like me, and you don't get players like this or SWF groups every game, then go crazy, killer is mad fun!

I think that's enough said about killer, now for survivor, and guess what? Its bad new again.

Lets talk about servers. A while ago dedicated servers were added to the game, FINALLY, this was meant to be our saving grace, it was supposed to protect us against lag switching killers (Still exists BTW, i'll get to that), it was meant to make what we call "vacuum" hits, disappear, it did not, all dedicated servers did was remove our ability to check the killers ping with a program, sure we can see all 4 survivors pings while in game, but we can't see killer ping, which is a BIG problem. These vacuum hits i mentioned, they only exist because things like hitting survivors, that's registered on the KILLERS client, the info is sent to the server, then bounced to the survivors clients, you know what that means? We can't see killer ping, you could go against a 90 ping killer, thinking "oh this lobby says i have 30 ping, ez", and then you vault a window, get 3 meters away from it and suddenly you are somehow STILL hit, this is because on the killers client, you are either still vaulting the window or have just finished vaulting, despite what it shows on your end. This also adds massive issues with huntress and deathslinger, the 2 killers that use direct hit projectiles as their main abilities. You see, after dedicated servers were introduced, these killers can now miss you by a good few meters and STILL get a hit on you with their projectile, sometimes it will hit your, what i like to call, "ghost hitbox", so it will hit a spot you were seconds ago and still register that as your current place, OR they can throw it ahead of you, and still completely miss, but still get the hit. These 2 killers i refuse to play against, i refuse, because you can be a crazy good looper, you can be great at your movement and baiting out throws, but it doesn't matter, you are still gonna get hit by something that you clearly dodged. On this same topic, i stopped playing the game like 7 months ago and only came back recently as i heard servers were improving, did they? Not really no, the best thing he had was the hit validation update, that fixed all these issues i just mentioned, the game felt the best it had in 3 years, you could properly 360 people without them getting hits they clearly missed, huntress and deathslinger actually required skill again to hit their shots, and vacuum hits were completely gone, BUT, the hit validation update was only a beta and lasted 2 days, now the game is back to being a sloppy, laggy mess, for killer and survivor, the game just feels bad again and it will remain this way till the hit validation is added again, was apparently removed due to bugs with deathslinger and huntress, some people claim what i said about these killers was happening DURING the Hit Validation Beta, but for me these killers were greatly improved and missed shots actually missed, so who knows.

Oh, and how can i forget about the garbage team mates? Again, if you are like me, getting to rank 1 is a non issue, game is easy (besides the whole vacuum hit thing), but the team mates i get are flat out atrocious! Being a rank 1 survivor, i expect to be matched with red rank team mates, and i usually am, however, these team mates of mine play like rank 50's, they are super immersed, they have the IQ of a walnut and they can barely loop for 3 seconds, this usually leaves me to do a 3 or 4 minute chase EVERY game, in which time 0 gens get completed, and EVERY game i finished at least, at LEAST 2 gens completely solo, usually 3 COMPLETELY SOLO, and the fourth is done with a team mate or 2, makes even survivor gameplay super stressful since you are left to do almost everything, even unhooks. Its gotten so bad to the point that i no longer run team based perks, my "team mates" are never on my team, so why should i support them?

I digress......if you are unfortunate enough to get team mates and swf groups like me in 95% of your games, you are going to have a horrific time, if you get the opposite, you are gonna have a great time, would i recommend this game to people? Sure, it CAN be fun, chases for example, they are fun as hell to me, i love looping killers and out braining them, and the game is usually really cheap, its on sale often enough, but my main recommendation would be if you are going to play this game, at least play with friends, DONT BE TOXIC TO KILLERS, but play with friends, it will make your survivor games much more enjoyable.

Se você esta procurando um jogo desbalanceado, com a comunidade tóxica, cheio de bugs que a empresa literalmente CAGA pra resolver e ainda de brinde ganha novos bugs a cada atualização, não precisa procurar mais, pq achou o seu jogo, agora se você quer preservar sua sanidade mental DBD não é pra você.
O jogo seria divertido se a empresa tivesse a minima vontade de corrigir erros frequentes (Bom dia Easy Anticheat), quedas de server que penalizam, sistema rankeado porco e desbalanceamento dos personagens em si... enfim... só vi dar minha opinião aqui para futuros jogadores pq novamente estou aqui procurando como resolver pela 8675 vez o ERRO !$ da lixeira do Easy Anti Cheat que não permite que eu se quer abra meu jogo. ^^

fun game. I like playing Blight and J flicking and everyone seems to enjoy playing against me. Fun DBD game definetely should get if you can and youll have fun until you get good then you'll have fun and hate yourself and hate the game and not have fun. If you don't understand what this game is like, imagine fortnite but instead of a 100 player battle royale made by epic games it is an asymetrical 4v1 horror game in which a killer tries to execute 4 survivors whose main goal is to complete the generators and escape. If you want people to like you definetely play Spirit and end game chat will always be fun. Watch no0b3 and otzdarva so that youll become rank 1 on both sides faster than you can actually learn how to play the game. You should buy it 100 per cent.
